sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinicopathological feature and prognosis of meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究腦膜瘤臨牀病理特徵及預後。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 18 patients with SRMs were analyzed and summarized retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性總結分析18例蝶骨嵴腦膜瘤的臨牀資料。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the curative effect of microsurgery on parasagittal meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高矢狀竇旁腦膜瘤的手術治療效果。

sentences.english: Review Articles Post-Dural Puncture Bacterial Meningitis.
sentences.chinese: 硬膜穿刺後的細菌性腦膜炎。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the microsurgical technique in managing medial sphenoid ridge meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內側型蝶骨嵴腦膜瘤顯微手術技巧。

sentences.english: On physical examination he was afebrile with no sign of meningism.
sentences.chinese: 經體格檢查無發熱及假性腦膜炎跡象。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the surgical results of parasagittal sinus meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討矢狀竇旁腦膜瘤手術治療效果。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical significance of dural tail sign in convexity meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討凸面腦膜瘤腦膜尾徵的臨牀意義。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical significance of dural tail sign in convexity meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討凸面腦膜瘤腦膜尾徵的臨牀意義。

sentences.english: The hematoma lay between the dural and the brain.
sentences.chinese: 里根腦血腫的部位處於硬腦膜與腦實質之間。

sentences.english: Deep skin infections were associated with staphylococcal meningitis in infancy.
sentences.chinese: 深部的皮膚感染在嬰兒期易並有葡萄球菌腦膜炎。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse imaging features of atypical meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析非典型腦膜瘤的影像學表現。

sentences.english: After surgical excision of the tumor, the patient was discharged smoothly. Pathology showed meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 此蝶鞍上腫瘤經手術切除後病理報告證實爲腦膜瘤。

sentences.english: At medium power, this meningioma is composed of whorled nests of cells.
sentences.chinese: 中倍鏡，腦膜瘤由旋渦狀瘤細胞巢組成。

sentences.english: These could be signs of meningitis, a potentially life-threatening infection.
sentences.chinese: 這些症狀可能是腦膜炎的前兆，有潛在的生命危險。

sentences.english: The gonococcus and meningococcus, for example, are coffee-bean shaped.
sentences.chinese: 例如，淋球菌和腦膜炎球菌都呈咖啡豆形。
